name: MONO (itch) (DwikiMR)
description:
MONO tells the story of a world that has been cursed by a strange witch. Everyone changes become a staple food ingredient. The mage had put the reversal medicine in undisclosed place. The person who finds the place of the medicine will be tested patience to find out whether or not the person is still worthy of being human.

This game aimed at players who have a passion for games puzzle game and high patience. I hope this game does not make players get emotional.
